LanguageData.BuildLMG.label: 制造 L-15 轻机枪
LanguageData.BuildLMG.description: Builds the L-15 LMG for personal defense. As a portable light machine gun the L-15 is heavy to carry around but is capable of providing 15-round bursts for suppressing fire.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildM56_USCM.label: 制造 M56 智能机枪
LanguageData.BuildM56_USCM.description: The M56 Smart Gun is a portable heavy machine gun with automatic targeting capabilities.\nCaliber: .50 BMG
LanguageData.BuildMinigun.label: 制造 XM214 速射机枪
LanguageData.BuildMinigun.description: Builds the XM214 Microgun, which is a multi-barrel machine gun with an extremely high rate of fire.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildGalilBurstRifle.label: 制造 RPK-74
LanguageData.BuildGalilBurstRifle.description: Builds the RPK-47, an ancient pattern military rifle. Fires an 8-round burst. Good range, low power and high rate of fire.\nCaliber: 7.62x39mm Soviet
LanguageData.BuildHeavyCombatRifle.label: 制造 MA39X ICWS
LanguageData.BuildHeavyCombatRifle.description: Builds the MA39X Individual Combat Weapon System, a close combat service rifle of the UNSC. Fires a 12-round burst with average medium range accuracy.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildM249.label: 制造 M249 LMG SAW 重机枪
LanguageData.BuildM249.description: Builds the M249 LMG SAW MG, a heavy machinegun. It has a 120 round magazine and fires in 20 round bursts. Not very accurate but good at providing suppressing fire.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
